body.name: Ewedoos Fleece Lined Leggings with Pockets for Women Thermal Warm Winter Leggings for Women High Waisted Workout Yoga Pants

asinVariationValues.variationValue: Dark Green Leggings With Pockets for Women
Snow Yoga Pants With Pockets for Women

features: Care instructions Machine Wash, Dry Clean Only

Fleece Lining Interior - With buttery soft fleece interior. Our Heat-tech fleece lined leggings will fit you like a second layer of skin and offer you both Comfort & Warmth when temperature drops. Whether you are hitting the gym or lounging at home, these are the great thermal leggings for women that make great Christmas Gifts & Holiday Presents.

Squat Proof Stretchy Fabric - To ensure maximum comfort and long lasting warmth in winter, Ewedoos fleece leggings for women are designed with a High tech 4-Way Stretchy Material. The Moisture-management fabric will wick your sweat away while retaining heat inside. Whether you’re stretching, bending or squatting, our winter leggings will always stay put and provide all the support you need.

Functional Side Pockets - Say goodbye to bulky backpack and say hello to our innovative & stylish yoga pants. Our Ewedoos thermal leggings with pockets for women come with 2 Side Pockets to offer you maximum convenience. Whether you need pockets to keep your phone, house keys or cash, these will be the performance fleece lined pants women for you.

High Waist & Tummy Control - Ewedoos fleece lined leggings womenhave an elastic High rise Waistband & Tummy Control that contour your curves and streamline your silhouette. Designed to offer Compression, Comfort & Style in one, These winter pants for women is a must-have for your cold gear collection.

Specialized Athleisure Brand - At Ewedoos, we strive to redefine workout clothes with functional, comfortable and stylish designs. We listen to our customers’ voices because that was the origin where we started with. We fine tune every detail of our products, hoping to make each item to be in higher quality, better durability and greater comfort but with an affordable price.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Treat yourself to the ultimate COZINESS from Ewedoos. Snug as hug, soft as cloud, smooth in texture. We choose WARMHUG fabric for Coziness Collection. These are the fleece lined leggings you'll feel equally comfortable at home or exploring in winter.

WARMHUG Fabric - This is a treat to wear. Previous page Next page Why do we make this? We all hate it. That stiff, restrictive feeling you get out in the cold. That's why, we built this soft base-layer that keeps you warm without being bulky or riding up, so you can stay focused all season long.
Get into Ewedoos Fleece Lined Leggings, crush any play you choose. Previous page Next page

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Most comfy warm leggings I've ever owned
reviews.reviewText: I order these a tad large and happy I did. For winter, I don't like pants to be as tight. These are so comfortable. They are warm enough to spend a little extra time outside in chilly weather. I don't think they would be very good for a yoga or workout class unless the room is really cold. They are well made and actually longer than I needed but I'm 5'3" so I expect that. They are well made and the pockets will easily hold a cell phone. I will be ordering at least one more pair soon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are GREAT! Fit great and the lining is butter soft and wears great.For chilly days, with boots, going out, they are made really well and love the side angled pockets.Will be buying more of these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Fit was just what I wanted. They look good on and they are not too heavy. I kept warm but did not feel like I was overly hot

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Helps block out the cold
reviews.reviewText: I bought them for outside cold weather. It helps to block out the cold but are not "fool proof". I did not exercise in them, just walked. They are lined and comfortable. I was pleasantly surprised that a Medium fit me with room. I'm 5ft and 150 pounds, so while they were roomy they were also long (but everything is). They do have a shine and there is a seam in the crotch. All my tops were long so not an issue, but worth noting. I very much liked the outside pockets. One on each side and room for your phone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very cozy and thick
reviews.reviewText: I moved up North to PNW from Texas and needed some thicker tights for winter. These are definitely thick and soft, stretchy, love having pockets and will be keeping me warm. however I’m not a huge fan of the shiny sheen of the fabric. It’s not too shiny so I think I will be keeping them. I’m 154 lbs and almost 5’5” and it hits right above my ankle with no scrunch which I like. I got a size medium and fits snug and comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am loving these leggings so am glad I got two pairs because I wear them most everyday. It’s very cool this time of yr in SoCal so the lining is perfect to keep my legs warm but not to warm. They’re very comfortable wearable & well made for the crazy good price! I Have washed once and came out beautiful like they are still brand new. They also have the side pockets for phone etc that I don’t use but nice incase I need a pocket! You won’t be disappointed. I am 5’5”” weight about 118. By their sizing chart ordered a small but were a bit tighter for my liking so I returned for med. perfect fit!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’m usually between medium and large and so I sized up in these leggings because I knew they were going to be thicker. I live in a cold winter state and walk my dog everyday so I wanted warmer leggings. These are by far the most comfortable leggings I’ve ever owned! You can tell they’re great quality, keep me warm, so comfy, and contain the hip pudge perfectly. Definitely recommend! Worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite leggings!
reviews.reviewText: They fit great. Super comfortable. Nice and warm. And they have fantastic pockets!

Die Leggins ist absolut Blickdicht, macht eine schöne Figur und ist einfach nur unglaublich bequem. Nichts verrutscht und alles bleibt an Ort und Stelle, trotz Sport. Mittlerweile habe ich sie mir bereits zum zweiten Mal bestellt, weil ich so begeistert bin. Die Länge ist optimal. Kann es zu 100% weiterempfehlen!
Habe 7 Stück und liebe sie sehr

reviews.reviewTitle: Sieht schön aus, rutscht leider durch glatte Innenseite
reviews.reviewText: Die Hose kam schnell und gut verpackt, hat nicht unangenehm gerochen.Die Nähte sind sehr gut verarbeitet.Sie fühlt sich auch sehr weich an und ist auf der Innenseite ungewöhnlich glatt. Dies führt leider dazu, dass sie unendlich rutscht obwohl man die richtige Größe trägt.Das Gummi im Bund ist leider sehr dünn und schneidet ein wenig ein, dies ist aber wirklich nur minimal.Das Preis-Leistungsverhältnis ist gut.

Ich liebe diese Leggings.Sie ist bequem, macht eine schöne Figur, hat zwei tiefe Taschen an den Beinen und eine kleine im Bund. Sie ist auch absolut blickdicht. Ich habe sie inzwischen in grau und schwarz. Sie lässt sich super kombinieren mit anderen Sachen. Man kann sie tragen im lässigen Outfit oder in schicker Variante mit Kleid.
Die Hose ist sehr bequem und man sieht nichts durchschimmern. Die Taschen sind super.Anfangs war ich skeptisch wegen der Größe, aber das war unberechtigt. Passt perfekt.
